posts.excerpt: Welcoming New Team Members to MsingiAI.

posts.title: The MsingiAI Vanguard Fellowship
posts.author: Kiplangat Korir
posts.excerpt: Join the next generation of AI researchers shaping the future of African language technology through our prestigious Vanguard Fellowship program.

posts.title: Essential Papers for Your AI Research Journey
posts.author: Kiplangat Korir
posts.excerpt: A curated list of must-read papers for aspiring AI researchers, focusing on Large Language Models, Benchmarks, Prompting, and more.

posts.title: Building a Swahili Tokenizer - The Foundation of Msingi1 and Sauti Ya Kenya
posts.author: Kiplangat Korir
posts.excerpt: A deep dive into MsingiAI's specialized Swahili tokenizer, designed to better capture the linguistic patterns and improve AI-powered communication tools for East Africa.

posts.title: Addressing Bias in African AI Models - A MsingiAI Priority
posts.author: Kiplangat Korir
posts.excerpt: Why MsingiAI is making bias detection and fairness a cornerstone of our African language AI development, and how we plan to tackle these crucial challenges.

posts.title: Sauti Ya Kenya - Building Authentic Kenyan Swahili Text-to-Speech
posts.author: Msingi AI Research Team
posts.excerpt: Introducing Sauti Ya Kenya, our groundbreaking initiative to create a Text-to-Speech system that truly captures the authentic sound and character of Kenyan Swahili.

posts.title: Why Finetuning Falls Short for African AI
posts.author: Kiplangat Korir
posts.excerpt: Africa doesn't need slightly adjusted versions of Silicon Valley's technological visions; it needs a fundamental reimagining of AI development that centers African data, expertise, and priorities from the ground up.

posts.title: MsingiAI Announces $10 Million Funding Round to Revolutionize AI for African Languages
posts.author: Msingi AI Team
posts.excerpt: MsingiAI is raising $10 million in funding to accelerate our mission of building AI technologies that truly understand and serve African languages and cultures.

posts.title: MsingiAI Data Challenge - Building Africa's Language Resources
posts.author: Msingi AI Research Team
posts.excerpt: Join our initiative to create the largest open-source dataset of African languages, powering the next generation of AI technologies.

posts.title: Pan-African Transfer Learning - Building AI That Understands Africa
posts.author: Kiplangat Korir
posts.excerpt: Announcing Msingi AI's groundbreaking research initiative on Pan-African Transfer Learning, aimed at creating AI models that truly understand and adapt to Africa's diverse linguistic and cultural landscape.
